## RemotePageInfoPayload interface

JSON structure provided by a remote tab info information source

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RemotePageInfoPayload 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [color](./tab-info.remotepageinfopayload.color.md) | string | Color of the button in the browser UI |
|  [description](./tab-info.remotepageinfopayload.description.md) | string | Description (markdown) to be rendered below the title in the popup |
|  [title](./tab-info.remotepageinfopayload.title.md) | string | Title to be rendered at the top of the popup |
